dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the performance comparison between active and passive intelligent reflecting surfaces (IRS) in 6G wireless networks.

dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on high-performance power allocation strategies specifically designed for secure spatial modulation networks.

dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the intelligent reflecting surface aided pilot contamination attack and its countermeasures.

dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on power allocation strategies for IRS-aided two-way decode-and-forward relay wireless networks.

dcterms:description: This dataset presents two enhanced-rate power allocation strategies for active IRS-assisted wireless networks.
